basics.name: Michal Lopasovsky
basics.label: Technical Artist
basics.summary:
During the past 10+ years in game development I had an opportunity to work with very talented people from whom I learned a lot.
I'm able to recognize necessary tasks and manage them on my own but I'm very excited to work with a team of people. My experience is in building art pipelines, content optimization and performance monitoring, support for artists and engineers, building my own tools and improving in-house editor tools.

I have many interests and I like to stay up to date with new technology. People describe me as a T-shaped person, I've both depth and breadth in my skills.

highlights: Bulding Streaming, Audio, Weather systems.
Building physically based VR player rig.
Creation of workflow tools: FBX mesh exporter - Mesh exporting from Blender3D, Texture exporter - channel packing and data exporting from Krita.
Unity3D tools: Scene selector - load/unload of multiple scenes, AssetPostProcessor - static collisions automation, static flags automation.
Unity3D Shader Graph - shader creation.
Creation of vfx effects in unity's VFX Graph.
Researching and writing a design document about 'Streaming system' for in-house 'Engine' including in-house 'Editor' workflow for Art and Design departments.
Designing 'World creation pipeline' for in-house 'Editor'.
Preparing budget quotas for multiple departments to fit into overall budget depending on the platform.
Support for 'FBX exporter' workflow.
Training environment artists and lightning artists of newly developed workflows and pipelines.
Streaming system - data maintenance
Environment data optimizations (mesh optimization, texture atlas optimization and texture compression optimization)
Development of standards together with Design department and enforcement of such standards.
Dynamic objects creation (destructible objects by vehicle or player and dynamic objects with physics) and their optimization.
Game performance monitoring.
In-house 'Editor' support for Art, Lighting and Design department.
Modelling and texturing any kind of environmental geometry. Designing and building complete levels and city districts.
Modelling and texturing various props, dynamic objects and environment assets.
Photogrammetry
Streaming system - data maintenance
Research, building and experimenting with photogrammetry.
Modelling and texturing various props and environment assets.
Beautifying ingame models, bug fixing and optimization to achieve required performance.
Creating art assets for the real-time simulation, modelling and texturing.
Building realistic looking environments.
Modelling and texturing various props and environment assets.
